text: Jon Snow (born 28 September 1947) is a British journalist and television presenter. He was born in Ardingly, Sussex. He went to Ardingly College. In 1989 he started presenting Channel 4 News. ==Personal life and family== In March 2010 he married Precious Lunga.Jon Snow weds His father was George D'Oyly Snow. His grandfather was Thomas D'Oyly Snow. His cousin is Peter Snow. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Channel 4 presenters Category:English journalists Category:English television presenters Category:Living people Category:People from Sussex
title: Jon Snow
